name: openapi-to-mcp
description: Generate production-ready MCP servers from OpenAPI/GraphQL/JSON-RPC schemas.

scripts.demo: node dist/packages/cli/src/index.js build --input examples/minimal/petstore.openapi.json --out examples/output/generated-minimal --type openapi --name petstore-mcp --emit-openapi-runtime && node dist/packages/cli/src/index.js build --input examples/advanced/rpc.json --out examples/output/generated-advanced --type jsonrpc --name rpc-mcp && node scripts/write-demo-summary.mjs

author: Exmanq
